lines.text:
[searching for explosives in a bathroom]
Did you find the bomb yet?

[emerges from a toilet stall]
Not the one we're looking for.
[after "Blankman" and "Other Guy" have broken into his lair]
Ah, Blankman. I see you've finally found someone to work with who dresses worse than you do.
Ratings give me a woody.
Slap me around and call me Susan.

[discussing Blankman]
Kevin, this is my calling. I have to make the world a safer place for my children.
Your children? You've got to be with a *woman* first! You've got to knock some boots, man! You're a virgin.
No, I'm a gentleman.
Obviously this is what you need to do to work through Grandma's death. *But*... we're gonna do it my way.
Okay, Karate Man!
What?
That's your crimefighter name.
Now... where is the Blankman?
[he pours hot coffee onto Mr. Stone, who sits in a wheelchair]
Hey, Einstein. In case you haven't noticed, this isn't a boil on my ass. I'm paralyzed from the waist down. I can't feel a thing.
[Minelli slaps him in the face]
I felt that.
Is that a purse snatcher? That's a job for Blankman.
You mean you knew?
